00028 GLShader::~GLShader()
00029 {
00030 
00031     if (m_numTextures != 0)
00032     {
00033         delete[] m_textureLocations;
00034         m_textureLocations = 0;
00035         m_numTextures = 0;

00047     m_fragmentShaderID = 0;

00050     char Buffer[512];
00051     sprintf(Buffer, "Destroying shader unique number %i\n", m_debugID);
00052     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);

00056 bool GLShader::loadShader(const char* vert, const char* frag)
00057 {
00058     while (glGetError() != 0)
00059     {
00060         //Get rid of existing GL errors
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (m_shaderProgramID != 0)
00064     {
00065         printf("Deleting existing shader\n");
00066 
00067         glDetachShader(m_shaderProgramID, m_fragmentShaderID);
00068         glDetachShader(m_shaderProgramID, m_vertexShaderID);
00069 
00070         glDeleteShader(m_fragmentShaderID);
00071         glDeleteShader(m_vertexShaderID);
00072 
00073         glDeleteProgram(m_shaderProgramID);
00074 
00075         m_shaderProgramID = 0;
00076         m_fragmentShaderID = 0;
00077         m_vertexShaderID = 0;
00078 
00079     }
00080 
00081 
00082     m_vertexShaderID = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00083 
00084 
00085     glShaderSource(m_vertexShaderID, 1,  (const GLchar**) &vert, 0);
00086 
00087 
00088     m_fragmentShaderID = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00089     glShaderSource(m_fragmentShaderID, 1, (const GLchar**) &frag, 0);
00090 
00091 
00092     glCompileShader(m_vertexShaderID);
00093     glCompileShader(m_fragmentShaderID);
00094 
00095     int isCompiledVS = 0;
00096     int isCompiledFS = 0;
00097 
00098     glGetShaderiv(m_vertexShaderID, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &isCompiledVS);
00099     glGetShaderiv(m_fragmentShaderID, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &isCompiledFS);
00100 
00101     if (isCompiledFS == false || isCompiledVS == false)
00102     {
00103         char Buffer[1024];
00104         sprintf(Buffer, "Could not compiler shaders. fragment result %i vertex result %i\n", isCompiledFS, isCompiledVS);
00105 
00106         if (isCompiledFS == false)
00107         {
00108 
00109             GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData("Fragment error");
00110 
00111             int len;
00112             glGetShaderInfoLog(m_fragmentShaderID, 1024, &len, Buffer);
00113 
00114             GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00115         }
00116 
00117         if (isCompiledVS == false)
00118         {
00119 
00120             GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData("Vertex error");
00121 
00122             int len;
00123             glGetShaderInfoLog(m_vertexShaderID, 1024, &len, Buffer);
00124 
00125             GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00126         }
00127 
00128         glDeleteShader(m_vertexShaderID);
00129         glDeleteShader(m_fragmentShaderID);
00130 
00131         m_vertexShaderID = 0;
00132         m_fragmentShaderID = 0;
00133         m_shaderProgramID = 0;
00134 
00135         return false;
00136     }
00137 
00138     m_shaderProgramID = glCreateProgram();
00139 
00140     glAttachShader(m_shaderProgramID, m_vertexShaderID);
00141     glAttachShader(m_shaderProgramID, m_fragmentShaderID);
00142 
00143     glLinkProgram(m_shaderProgramID);
00144 
00145     int isLinked = 0;
00146 
00147     glGetProgramiv(m_shaderProgramID, GL_LINK_STATUS, (int *)&isLinked);
00148 
00149     if (isLinked == 0)
00150     {
00151         glDetachShader(m_shaderProgramID, m_fragmentShaderID);
00152         glDetachShader(m_shaderProgramID, m_vertexShaderID);
00153 
00154         glDeleteShader(m_fragmentShaderID);
00155         glDeleteShader(m_vertexShaderID);
00156 
00157         glDeleteProgram(m_shaderProgramID);
00158 
00159         m_shaderProgramID = 0;
00160         m_fragmentShaderID = 0;
00161         m_vertexShaderID = 0;
00162     }
00163 
00164     unsigned int errorMessage = glGetError();
00165 
00166     if (errorMessage != 0)
00167     {
00168         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData("Error occured compiling shader");
00169     }
00170 
00171     printf("Compiled shader results %i %i %i\n", isLinked, isCompiledVS, isCompiledFS);
00172 
00173     return true;
00174 }

00176 void GLShader::setNumberOfTextures(unsigned int number)
00177 {
00178     if (number == 0)
00179     {
00180         if (m_numTextures != 0)
00181         {
00182             delete[] m_textureLocations;
00183             m_textureLocations = 0;
00184             m_numTextures = 0;
00185         }
00186 
00187     }
00188     else
00189     {
00190 
00191         if (m_numTextures != 0)
00192         {
00193             delete[] m_textureLocations;
00194             m_textureLocations = 0;
00195             m_numTextures = 0;
00196         }
00197 
00198         m_textureLocations = new GLuint[number];
00199 
00200         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < number; ++i)
00201         {
00202             m_textureLocations[i] = 0;
00203         }
00204 
00205         m_numTextures = number;
00206 
00207     }
00208 }

00210 void GLShader::setTextureName(unsigned int i, const char* Name)
00211 {
00212     if (m_numTextures <= i)
00213         return;
00214 
00215     if (m_shaderProgramID == 0)
00216         return;
00217 
00218     activateShader();
00219 
00220     m_textureLocations[i] = glGetUniformLocation(m_shaderProgramID, Name);
00221 
00222     glUniform1i(m_textureLocations[i], static_cast<GLint>(i));
00223 }
00224 
00225 void GLShader::setTexture(unsigned int i, Texture* tex)
00226 {
00227     if (m_numTextures <= i)
00228         return;
00229 
00230     if (m_shaderProgramID == 0)
00231         return;
00232 
00233     activateShader();
00234 
00235     glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0 + i);
00236 
00237     if (tex == 0)
00238         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00239     else
00240         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, ((GLTexture*)(tex))->getTextureID());
00241 
00242     glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
00243 }
00244 
00245 void GLShader::activateShader()
00246 {
00247     glUseProgram(m_shaderProgramID);
00248 }
00249 
00250 void GLShader::deactivateShader()
00251 {
00252     glUseProgram(0);
00253 }
